modName: Unarmed Warfare - New Animations For Hand To Hand Combat
summary: The goal of this modification is to give the player more interesting unarmed combat animations. With this modification you can combine your unarmed attacks and create better looking combat with kicks and hits. You can hit, hit and then kick and hit again. Or you can just kick, kick and kick or hit. Videos and pictures will show more about the mod.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][youtube]wP0GzVkugaI[/youtube][/center]


[center][youtube]b3yQ5_11pRg[/youtube][/center]
[center][youtube]hZYvSCCtf9k[/youtube][/center]
[center][img]http://i39.tinypic.com/dzvx2o.png[/img][/center]
[b][color=yellow]The goal of this modification is to give the player more interesting unarmed combat animations. I always wanted to have an ability to kick and hit. With this modification, it will be possible. Special thanks go to evanoblivion, who created these fantastic new animations.

With this modification you can combine your unarmed attacks. You can hit, hit and then kick and hit again. Or you can just kick, kick and kick or hit. The unarmed combat will be much funnier and looks a lot better.

I changed the power attacks of unarmed combat to different kind of kicks. This mod changes the left arm power attack, right arm power attack and the power attack with both hands.[/color][/b]

[b][center]-KEY MAPPING-
[color=turquoise]Left attack: Normal hit
Left power attack: Kick up with right foot
Right attack: Normal hit
Right power attack: Roundhouse kick
Dual power attack: Round kick with both legs[/color][/center][/b]

[b][center]-KEY MAPPING-
-Version 1.0 Optional-
[color=turquoise]Left attack: Normal hit
Left power attack: Round kick with right foot
Right attack: Normal hit
Right power attack: Front kick
Dual power attack: Round kick with both legs[/color][/center][/b]

[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/qz3ju1.png[/img]
[b][color=yellow]-How to install-

-You can use NMM(Nexus Mod Manager) to install this mod.

-If you want to install manually, just copy the files in your skyrim/data/meshes/actors/character/animations folder.[/color][/b]


SPECIAL THANKS TO evanoblivion who made this modification possible.


Check his mod Kick Bash:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44666/?]Kick Bash[/url]

-Don't forget to endorse if you like the mod.
-Feel free to add some images.
-Give me some feedback.
-Also if you like the videos, subscribe my Youtube channel.

Translations:
[url=http://tes-game.ru/load/skyrim/animacii/5374/49-1-0-7136]Russian[/url]

More information about my mods:

[url=http://wkcreations.blogspot.fi/]Click here[/url]
author: WarriorKeKe
